projectPurpose: To provide a highly performant, feature-rich, and customizable terminal-based file manager for power users who prefer working in the command line, emphasizing speed through async I/O and modern features like multimedia previews and a plugin system.
mainFeatures: Blazing fast performance based on async I/O in Rust
Full Asynchronous Support and Task Management
Built-in Image and Code Previews (with scrolling, syntax highlighting, image protocol support)
Concurrent Plugin System with Lua and built-in Package Manager
Integration with fd, rg, fzf, zoxide
marketPositioning: Yazi is positioned as a next-generation terminal file manager that prioritizes speed and responsiveness through modern programming practices (Rust, async I/O) while offering a comprehensive set of features often requiring external tools in other managers, wrapped in a highly customizable interface with a built-in plugin ecosystem. It targets power users who demand high performance and rich functionality, including advanced previews and task management, without leaving the terminal, setting it apart from more traditional or minimalist alternatives.
